TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpContextBase extends System.Object implements class System.IServiceProvider
Public MustInherit Class HttpContextBase Implements IServiceProvider
public ref class HttpContextBase abstract : IServiceProvider

summary.span: 作為包含個別 HTTP 要求之 HTTP 特定資訊之類別的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that contain HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，且該工作外的 ASP.NET 管線。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，您通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例中的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，您通常使用的執行個體類別上呼叫成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members on the object.

MemberSignature.Value: protected HttpContextBase ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: HttpContextBase();

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，接受 要求。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, accepts an request.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，取得或設定值，這個值表示是否在 ASP.NET 要求處理期間不應出現的各部分過程中允許非同步作業。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.

value.span: 如果 ASP.NET 在未預期的情況下使用了非同步 API 而擲回例外狀況，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, .

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定`handler`至`null`的預設處理常式用來處理要求。If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request. 您可以設定`handler`非同步處理常式或同步處理常式。You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler. 此處理常式必須實作介面。The handler must implement the interface.

param.name: path

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用指定的路徑和值重寫 URL，這個值會指定是否修改伺服器資源的虛擬路徑。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, rewrites the URL by using the specified path and a value that specifies whether the virtual path for server resources is modified.
Always.

Always.
